name: She hunts me in my dreams
name_original: She hunts me in my dreams
description:
Every night you have nightmares about some castle. In it a veiled figure hunts you. You don't know why. Explore the castle and it's surroundings, find out why she hunts you and maybe help yourself with your nightmares.

Submission to Brakeys Game Jam 2022.1

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - camera
  • E - Interact

Known Issues

  • Render settings in the published build are slightly broken and all environments are slightly brighter than intended.
  • Ending knowledge test does not work.

Correct Answers (Character Initials) Spoilers !!!

C. R.; M. R.; A. A.; C. C.;
